mapper.insert: INSERT INTO the_circulation ( state, circulation, createdata, username,parentnodeId,city,rolename,updatedata,spare ) VALUES ( #{state},#{circulation},#{createdata},#{username},#{ParentnodeId},#{city},#{rolename},#{updatedata},#{spare})

INSERT INTO the_circulation ( state, circulation, createdata, username,parentnodeId,city,rolename,updatedata,spare ) VALUES (#{state},#{circulation},#{createdata},#{username},#{ParentnodeId},#{city},#{rolename},#{updatedata},#{spare})
mapper.select: SELECT circulation,updatedata,city,rolename,username FROM the_circulation where spare = #{spare} and city=#{city} and parentnodeId= #{ParentnodeId} and username= #{username} ORDER BY id
